729113f-a.title: Richmond: Manor Road - Brielle Avenue
729113f-a.text:
Manor RoAd, West side, about 90U yards south of
Brielle Avenue, snowing, in a set of two views, part of the
17-acre T. L. Meinikheim farm. The property is now (1939)
part of Sca View Hoapital.
About 1910
Views 1-2
By ulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
NO REPRODUCTIONS

729105f-a.text:
Eqbert House, Manor Road, w.s., 350 yds. south of

n.d.
Acquired from the N.1. Herald Iribune aorgue, 1948.
48(482
729105f-a.folder: Manor Road & Brielle Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729112f-a.title: Richmond: Manor Road - Brielle Avenue
729112f-a.text:
Manor Road, west side, 350 yards south of Brielle ..venue, showing
the old Egbert House, dating back to colonial days. The house later
belonged to J. Wood (Buller's 1853 map); to White (Beers's 1874 and
1887 maps); to Theodore Siersema (Robinson's 1898 map), and to David
Kaplan (1907 Robinson map). The 1917 map shows it to be on the land of
Sea View Hospital. Mr. P. L. Sperr, who photographed other views of
this house, states that the house was being used as the sheepherder's
cottage of the hospital.
1920's
Ewing Galloway
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729112f-a.folder: Manor Road & Brielle Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729114f-a.title: Richmond: Manor Road - Brielle Avenue
729114f-a.text:
(1)
Manor Road, west side, 350 yards south of Brielle Avenue,
showing the old Egbert House, dating back to colonial days.
It passed into the hands of J. Wood, according to Butler's
1853 map, and to White, according to Beers's maps of 1874 and
1887. Still later it became the property of Theodore Siersema,
and David Kaplan, as indicated in the Robinson atlases of 1898
and 1907, respectively. Mr. P. L. Sperr states that the house
was being used as the sheepherder's cottage of Sea View Hospital,
at the time this photograph was taken. T)is view showa the east
side and rear of the house.
1924
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
A full front view of the house.
October 4, 1925
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3) The front and east side of the house.
October 4, 1925
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729114f-a.folder: Manor Road & Brielle Avenue, Staten Island, NY
